VirtualMedia.description: The VirtualMedia schema contains properties related to the monitor and control of an instance of virtual media, such as a remote CD, DVD, or USB device.  A manager for a system or device provides virtual media functionality.
VirtualMedia.longDescription: This Resource shall represent a virtual media service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #VirtualMedia.VirtualMedia
